Reviews.Title: “A yearly must do!”
Reviews.Author: hlg263
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have been staying at Lilley's Landing at least once a weekend every year since 2003! It is a family tradition that his family started years ago and we plan to continue on with our own family. Every year we look forward to our fall visit to Branson, but I think we are all truely just looking forward to our visit at Lilley's! When my husband and I decided to get married on June 1 of this year there was no argument as to how we would spend our honeymoon which was at Lilley's of course! We are not avid trout fishermen but do enjoy the beauty of Lake Taneycomoe and spent at least two evenings out on the dock with a bottle of wine enjoying the cool breezes and beautiful views. Our teen daughter looks forward to the pickup games of basketball with her aunts and uncles in the fall and is really looking forward to the day that the weather is warm enough during one of our stays to enjoy the pool. Lilley's is a dog friendly resort and it is great fun meeting and greeting the other guests with their furry little companions. We have two westies that love to travel along with us and it is a great relief to not have to worry about them at a kennel. Although we won't be making the visit this fall due to a family wedding we are very much so looking forward to a visit in 2013 and will probably throw a summer 2013 excursion to Lilley's in just for good measure. If you are looking for an upscale hotel experience this is not for you, there are plenty of places on the strip for that. The pictures on trip advisor paint an acurate portrait of what to expect. This is a fishing resort. However, if you are looking for a great place to enjoy your family this is the place for you! The cabins are comfortable and efficient. I'm not a fan of the bedding so I bring my own, however unless I am planning a stay at a top hotel I have learned to bring my own bedding most anywhere. I can't say enough about the Lilley's experience!!! I love having my early morning coffee on the dock. I love the smell of breakfast being cooked at the various cabins around me. I love the friendliness of all of the other Lilley's guests. I could spend an entire day just sitting on the deck and walking my dogs on the docks. The carefully manicured and lush landscaping all around Lilley's is almost as breathtaking as the views of the fall foliage along lake Taneycomoe. You can tell that the Lilley family puts a lot of love into their resort and that just makes the visit all the more enjoyable. I can't wait to go back!

Reviews.Title: “Well run small resort next to Branson”
Reviews.Author: John S
Reviews.Content: I enjoyed my stay and would stay again. The biggest problem is booking a trip far enough in advance so that they have rooms available. The cook breeze off of Lake Taneycomo's 50 degree year round temperature allowed me to enjoy sitting out on the balcony on 100 degree plus days. I went to fish for trout and caught 7 Rainbow but I wasnt able to catch any off of the dock. If you ever take a trip to Branson, do yourself a favor and stay at a place like Lilleys and introduce yourself to Taneycomo trout fishing.

Reviews.Title: “This just maybe the best fishing resort on Taneycomo”
Reviews.Author: Chuck73
Reviews.Content: this is truly a great resort - geared towards fishermen but great for the family too. it is as if they spent years asking fishermen what they wanted in a resort, then they provided it. great staff that are ready to lend a hand, a loaded tackle shop, decent prices and oh what a fishing dock with ammenities. we try to get down there at least twice a year, and once we reitire, will make it more than that. thanks Lilley's.

Reviews.Title: “just like home”
Reviews.Author: Chuck S
Reviews.Content: We found this Gem 8 years ago and its the only place we stay when in Branson. The trout dock is my favorite spot on the property, no matter how hot it is, there is always a cool breeze blowing there. Also the staff are wonderful people, always friendly and helpful. The rooms are always clean, and the property always in top shape thanks to Curtis! Will go back next year if the Good Lord allows. There are cheaper, newer, and fancier places to stay in town, but without the serenity found at Lilliey's, it's a one of a kind experience!

Reviews.Title: “Reservations”
Reviews.Author: Deb S
Reviews.Content: Just because you make a reservation and pay the deposit does not mean you are guaranteed a place to stay. I received a call 10 days prior to check in and they CANCELED my reservation! They said the information was incorrect; however, an e-mail verifying my information stated everything correctly. I am pretty sure they found someone to take a whole week rather than my 4 night stay. However, on their website it states that any reservation after May 4th requires a 3 night minimum stay. Sad part is that this is going to be a one to two times a year trip for me for the next four years.....I won't be going to Lilley' Landing!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Family Vacation Spot”
Reviews.Author: Nitag557
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Lilleys Landing for many years and prefer it over many others on Taneycomo. The cabins are clean, personnel friendly and pool is clean. Great dock. We recently rented a pontoon for the full day and thoroughly enjoyed it. Reasonalbe rates and again a very clean boat. Made for a relaxing trip. Can't wait till we go back in the fall of 2012.

Reviews.Title: “We LOVE Lilley's”
Reviews.Author: Judy K
Reviews.Content: My husband and I try to get to Lilley's at least once a year to fish. Our usual relaxing weekend on the lake was a bit more exciting this year. We rented a john boat, as usual, and headed out in search of trout. Long story short, the water was running fast and we found ourselves trapped by a downed tree. The boat became partially submerged and we struggled to get to shore. Fortunately, my cell phone still worked and I called Lilley's. Ryan, Curtis, and Eric came to the rescue. They were so sweet, not one cross word, They were just glad we were ok. They even fished out my husband's pack with his wallet, etc. We'll definitely be back, but maybe we'll just fish from the dock next time. Wonderful people, cozy cabins, reasonable rates, just the right distance from the Strip. You gotta go!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay, and good shop”
Reviews.Author: JPTinKS
Reviews.Content: If you've never stayed at Lilleys Landing, you really need to. We've stayed here at least 4 different times now, always enjoy it. No, we don't go to the attractions on "The Strip". We're there to fish. Period. So, if that's what you're after, you won't be disappointed. Rooms are average, only certain ones have a tub, so if you're one of those people who must have a tub, make sure you ask about the specific room they're assigning to you. The pro / fly shop is absolutely excellent. The choice of flys is excellent for a place this size, and the tackle and other items for sale is great. Get your fishing license here too. The staff and service folks here are also very nice. Grounds are very well maintained as well.

Reviews.Title: “Never Disappoints!”
Reviews.Author: 3catsmom
Reviews.Content: My husband and I have stayed at Lilley's Landing numerous times, including on our honeymoon, 16 years ago! We have never been disappointed in our experience from the cozy cabins to the fishing and endless activities offered in the Branson area. Our most recent trip was this past fall, in October. I have tried to post a review several times, but for some reason have had difficulty. The cabins are always clean. If you rent boats and motors from them, they are always well maintained. The staff are all very helpful in showing you where to fish and areas to avoid. They have a great bait and tackel shop with everything you need to fish. We have stayed at Lilley's Landing in all seasons and have never been "skunked" on Lake Tanneycoma, always catching our limit of Rainbow Trout. A place we will visit again and again!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: marla g
Reviews.Content: Everything is great! The owners and all of the employess are very kind and will do anything to make your stay wonderful. The rental boats are very well kept up. Nice place to relax and catch some fish. Book early though as they sell out quickly!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place To Relax”
Reviews.Author: mhurtrail
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Lilley's for 10+ years and we always have a great time. This is a great place to base your fishing trip from, or just put you feet up and watch the world go past. The people are great and we really enjoy our trip every year.

Reviews.Title: “Great Place”
Reviews.Author: david p
Reviews.Content: You don't have to even fish to have a wonderful time here. Great resort and great part of the country. The fishing is a blast and prices are very reasonable. The Lilley's are as nice as family as one could meet. They are very dog friendly which we love and our Yorkie is treated like a guest. You could never go wrong spending time there.

Reviews.Title: “Fitz-Randolph Clan Days”
Reviews.Author: BECKY Z
Reviews.Content: We spent a week, from October 16th through the 23rd. Can you say AWESOME? A great time was had by the whole family.....I heard not a single derogatory word from our group of 8 people, about anything, all week. Fishing wasn't too good, but even the fishermen in our group had a good time. Thanks to the Father Figure of our Clan and to the Staff of Lilley's Landing.

Reviews.Title: “Better than expected.”
Reviews.Author: Orion777
Reviews.Content: First let me say that my husband made me go on a fishing trip. So with that in mind, my review is based from a non-sportsman opinion. We had a 3 bedroom/2 bathroom on the lake location. It was very roomy and it was similar to a corporate apartment as it had cookware, towels, etc. The balcony had a huge table with seating for about 8 and a bbq grill. The staff comes around and cleans all of the bbq's every day. (Each cabin has its own grill.) And on our last day there, the used grills were being replaced with new. My husband likes this place because he can park his boat right outside in one of the 30+ boat slips they have. The outside of the place is pretty rustic but the people are friendly and the inside was more like a home than a cabin, i.e. the walls were drywall, the bathrooms were similar to home, the kitchen had a nice island, etc. The things I did not like (but not too much because I will be going back again) was that there were no tvs in the bedrooms (but hey, you are there to enjoy the outdoors, right?); upon leaving you are asked to make sure you take out all of your garbage (again this is no big deal because you have to do it at home, right?); and you share a balcony (which is not a hassle because most people who stay at this place are usually older nice people like ourselves). We had our dog with us and others had pets there as well. The place was immaculate. There are always people tending to the grounds, etc. You have privacy because they really don't come in to clean till you check out. You just set your towels outside your door if you need to exchange towels. So even though I am not a rustic kind of person, I will be going back again next Spring with my husband. Also, there are fishing guides available and if you want to make sure you catch some fish and you are not that familiar with this lake, then this is an option to consider. The tv had many many channels and the internet worked great, as did the central ac and heat. Our first 2 nights in the area were spent at an area hotel then our last 3 nights were here and it was most enjoyable to bbq and sit around with pretty scenery. If you like rustic but also like the comforts of home, and love the outdoors, then this is the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay and right on the water”
Reviews.Author: BradWiegmann
Reviews.Content: Lilleys's Landing is a great place to stay right on the banks of Lake Taneycomo. The staff was extremely friendly and rooms were clean. Their tackle shop has everything you need to catch the big trophy trout swimming in Taneycomo.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Boat rental for the Day!”
Reviews.Author: gmwhynot
Reviews.Content: My husband and I recently rented a pontoon boat for half a day from Lilleys Landing. We were not guests at their resort. The employees at the Marina were very helpful and very nice. We rented the boat for 5 hours and had a great time. We drove down stream and saw some beautiful sights along the Taneycomo Lake. Our pontoon was clean and worked very well. If we need to rent a boat while in Branson again, we will definitely return here to Lilley's Landing for our rental.

Reviews.Title: “Most relaxing vacation ever!”
Reviews.Author: OrneryUrchin
Reviews.Content: Lilleys Landing is just super! My husband had just retired and wanted to go Branson and catch some fish. We rented a cabin and a boat and headed off. We caught lots of fish so he was happy. I was happy because the people at Lilleys Landing are so friendly, kind and helpful. Our dog got sick and needed to see a Vet and they helped us find one, set up the appt. etc. It all went very smoothly and we are most appreciative of their kindness and helpfulness. Cabins are clean and well supplied, quiet and peaceful surroundings. Great place!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to build memories!”
Reviews.Author: cowchickgina
Reviews.Content: When I was a kid we stayed at lilley's every year some of my best childhood memories are of this place! The staff was always very welcoming and accommodating! I plan on showing my children this wonderful place this next summer and sharing those incredible memories with them! I would recommended this place to anyone looking for a friendly and accommodating resort in Brandon!

Reviews.Title: “What can you say except...............Excellent”
Reviews.Author: Max773
Reviews.Content: My husband and friends of ours have been coming to Lilleys for about 4 years now. We go to Branson usually twice a year for the last 8 years. We stayed at another place till we found Lilleys and I would never go any were else. The staff are very outgoing, accommodating and helpful, the accommodations are great. It is a place were you can go and relax and have peace of mind. You can truly get lost in the surroundings of a beautiful, well kept and just overall "get lost from everyday life place". It is hard at times to get a reservation and and you have to do it a year in advace, so that should tell you how great a place it is. Lilleys does try and help and will put you on a waiting list for a cancellation and will call you if they get one. Take it!!! you won't regret it. Have fun fishing, relaxing on the waters edge and then if you wish head into Branson for great resturants and shows. For the kids there is a ton of things to do, best of all, your only 3 minutes for everything. Thank you Lileys for always making my trip to Branson memorable.

Reviews.Title: “Lilleys is GREAT”
Reviews.Author: kfred79
Reviews.Content: All you have to do is go to Lilllys' reservation page and their service speaks for itself. You can't get a room because it's nearly booked in a years advance. People like myself always return. It is one of the most peaceful places you can stay in Branson. Me and my husband absolutely love it there. Our only problem is we don't book it soon enough sometimes.... Lilly's keep up the good work and thank you so much for a wonderful place to stay.... Karen Frederick

Reviews.Title: “Another great time @ Lilley's”
Reviews.Author: kbsherman
Reviews.Content: We've been coming to Lilley's for over 15 years, and this time was no different. Great fishing, wonderful accomodations and warm, helpfull folks at every turn. Even with the floods that occurred a few weeks prior to our visit, the grounds were well maintained and very clean, and the docks were back in the water and stable, even missing a few in the middle. We've already booked our return visit in October, and hope the fishing remains excellent. We caught our limit each day, with several rainbows 24 - 26 inches and several pounds. Powerbait and worms worked the best. Good luck!

Reviews.Title: “I want to go back!”
Reviews.Author: cjnky
Reviews.Content: Unit 14 was the only thing lakeside unit available for our visit, so I feared that it might be inferior accomodations. Was I ever wrong!! The website pictures do not do justice to this unit - it is great - with two kings or four twin beds plus sleeper couch and full kitchen and yet no crowded feeling to it. While other guests were busy catching trout out of Lake Tannycomo, we were just there to enjoy the peace and quiet it offered after a busy day in Branson or Silver Dollar City. They were busy recovering from flood damage when we were there, but still managed to keep the place spotlessly clean, and landscaping in top notch shape. If internet connection is important to you, theirs is great. I really can think of nothing negative about this place.

Reviews.Title: “Family Get Together”
Reviews.Author: sjbonnin
Reviews.Content: For several years, sisters and spouses have been getting together once a year at Branson. This was our second year at Lilley's Landing and planning to return again the coming year. Love being on the lake, away from the busy traffic but still close to everything. There are several floor plans to choose from and the rooms are very clean, well kept and the service excellant.

Reviews.Title: “Great fishing, Great people, Great place to stay!!”
Reviews.Author: brianquis
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at several of the family owned fishing resorts on lake Taneycomo. I was very impressed with Lilley's Landing. The rooms were clean, the resort was very well kept up with beautiful flower beds, a nice clean pool, nice respectful people, one of the most well stocked bait shops I have seen at a resort, and wondeful docks. My family had a wonderful time there and I know where we will be staying for our next Branson vacation. Great location too I can fish and my wife is just minutes away from the strip to go shopping. All in all I would say it is all you could want in a fishing resort.

Reviews.Title: “A no-frills, basic and clean place to stay”
Reviews.Author: WiltshireScots
Reviews.Content: We stayed in cabin number 16. Whilst it was clean and utilitarian, It is a little old fashioned and the bedding leaves a lot to be desired. The double bed had two single comforters rather than one that fitted the queen size bed. The towels were faded and thin too, It was a little disconcerting when we read a note asking not to use the towels to clean any fish that had been caught! . We only stayed a couple of nights so did not use any of the crockery. It is fairly well stocked but again with basic stuff. We had a problem with flies and this may be because the resort is really a fisherman's hang out. It is a no smoking cabin but on entry there was a definate whiff of smoke. On the upside we had a lovely balcony (although it is shared with the adjoining cabin) which looked out over Lake Taneycomo, although at this end it is more of a river. We were only a few miles away from the strip but the road to the strip is dark and winding. However it is a really peaceful setting and the view over the lake was very relaxing. Overall if you can overlook the need for updating and want a quiet get away then you could do a lot worse than here.

Reviews.Title: “Great place on Lake Taneycomo”
Reviews.Author: zippy076
Reviews.Content: Friendly People, Great Service A wonderful setting on the lake. This is a quiet place off the beaten path yet easy access to Branson and all the activities.

Reviews.Title: “Best Place on Lake Taneycomo”
Reviews.Author: ripper40
Reviews.Content: Fishing and Family and away from the Strip. It's a family event and atmosphere at Lilley's. Best fishing on the lake, staff is excellent, everything you need. Very clean and wholesome atmosphere with a staff that is helpful with everything. I am a fisherman and it it a fisherman's paradise. (Only reason not to recommend is to keep it a secret for yourself--it is the "Best")

Reviews.Title: “A place where you feel right at home with everyone”
Reviews.Author: wilstermanl
Reviews.Content: We had a wonderful time even when it rained. Because we would very comfortable in our cabin. We were still able to cook on the grill because we had a deck with a cover which was very nice. The people who worked there and other patrons were all very nice. It was very close to the stores and sites. It was very reasonable as well . We liked the fact that others brought their dogs too and we did not hear any barking at night. They have fishing boats and pontoons right there on the property which is very nice. We will be back again for sure. Judd and Linda

Reviews.Title: “A wonderful place to relax, fish, and get away from it all...”
Reviews.Author: bwescoat
Reviews.Content: You will not find any kinder hosts than those at Lilley's Landing. We've been there the last 2 summers and will go again. We love the atmosphere, the lake view rooms, the helpful fisherman hanging around and the peace and quiet.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay again. Great place.”
Reviews.Author: fishrman78
Reviews.Content: Stayed 4 nights and enjoyed every minute. A nice quiet place to stay in the heart of the Ozarks. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Cabins are clean and nice. Had an awesome time fishing the lake as well. We will definitely be back.

Reviews.Title: “Trout Fishing? Stay at Lilleys'!”
Reviews.Author: Stevan6891
Reviews.Content: There are many fine hotels, motels and lodges in the Branson area, but if you are a trout fisherman the ONLY place to stay is Lilleys Landing. The staff is always helpful and courteous and always extremely responsive to any request. The rooms and condos are clean, modern and well kept. There is great fishing off the dock, or you can rent a boat at the marina. By the way, this a great place to stay even if you're not trout fishing. But, it's the perfect place to stay if you are. Phil Lilley and his family and staff know how to run a lodge and make their guests feel like family. They truly go the extra mile!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Resort, family owned and operated, very friendly, terrific place to stay”
Reviews.Author: khanna4012
Reviews.Content: Best place we have ever stayed in Branson, friendly, clean, cozy, family oriented, awesome place, we love it, and will always stay at Lilleys in the future....

Reviews.Title: “The Ultimate Trout Resort”
Reviews.Author: Chuck73
Reviews.Content: Lilley's has to be one of, if not the top trout fishing resort in the country. They have thought of everything from well equiped lodging, to an everything you need tackle shop, plastic bags and hand sanitizer at the superb fish cleaning stations - they even provided electric/motion detector paper towel dispensers at the cleaning station so you don't make a mess getting a towell. the boat slips are large and padded and there is plent of room to fish from the dock. It is as if someone dreamed up the ideal amenities and Lilley's provided them. My folks and I first stayed there many years ago and it gets better every stay. the fishing was great too - we figure two of us caught about 200 trout in 3 days fishing - kept 8 to eat and had a blast. thanks Lilley's

Reviews.Title: “The best kept secret in Branson”
Reviews.Author: imbutton
Reviews.Content: We wanted to stay in a setting other than the typical motel atmosphere when we came to Branson for our 53rd anniversary. Our daughter had passed Lilley's Landing on a previous fishing trip and was impressed with the appearance. From the moment we made our reservation until we reluctantly had to go home, our stay at Lilley's was more than perfect. The grounds are immaculate, our cabin was delightful with all the amenities of home coupled with Ozark rustic decore. I can't say enough nice things about the staff, everyone was friendly, helpful and professional. We are looking forward to our 54th anniversary at Lilley's Landing in 2011.

Reviews.Title: “The Perfect Resort”
Reviews.Author: trout2244
Reviews.Content: This is the place to relax and trout fish if you like. Such a beautiful resort on the lake and just minutes away from the sights of Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Lilley's Landing -- the place for fun, family & relaxation”
Reviews.Author: BobKoogler
Reviews.Content: We just returned from another great family vacation at Lilley's Landing (June 19-July 3). Lilley's provides the ultimate setting for a Branson family vacation. It is located off the busy strip, nestled along the banks of Lake Taneycomo. You can visit the shows, dining spots, entertainment and shop -till-you-drop then return to Lilley's where it is quiet and beautiful. The owners of Lilley's keep the pool and grounds immaulate. Flowers, trees, bushes -- all perfectly manicured. Heck , they even clean out your BBQ pit after you use it. Lilley's has the best Fly shop on the Lake and the staff is always friendly, accomodating and available when needed. We can't wait for our next visit!

Reviews.Title: “best fishing resort in the lower 48!!!”
Reviews.Author: fishingfool76
Reviews.Content: Been to Lilleys' Landind 2x this year and I can't say enough good things about it!!! This resort is peaceful, clean, and roomy. The friendly & helpful staff will make sure you know what the trout are biting on and best of all THE FISHING IS FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “HOME AWAY FROM HOME”
Reviews.Author: dee21597
Reviews.Content: We have been staying at Lilleys' Landing for over 10 years and we can't think of a better place that we would rather to stay at. We are in Branson 2-3 times a year and I am very sad every time I have to leave. It is family owned and a wonderful family at that. All the staff/family are just great and they are all very helpful! We always feel right at home while we are there. Lillys' is very quiet and peaceful and you wouldn't even know the main strip is 2-3 minutes away. Another big plus is that they accept your pets, which most places don't anymore and that means alot to pet owners. Can't wait to go back in the Fall, and possibly Christmas!

Reviews.Title: “Great Time”
Reviews.Author: Chirp01
Reviews.Content: I am a Retired Air Force pilot and have lliterally traveled all over the world, and believe me Lilleys rates right up there with the best. The personal weere extremely courteous, efficient and polite. If everything works out we will be seeing you sometime this fall.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding, a great place to visit, would strongly recommend.”
Reviews.Author: mike_workman
Reviews.Content: We have been going to Lilleys Landing for at least 15 years now and will continue to go there. They are great people to work with and have great facilties. Fishing is great, rooms are clean and prices are very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “Best place to stay on Lake Taneycomo.”
Reviews.Author: troutN4me
Reviews.Content: Over the last three decades I have stayed at 3 different locations prior to my stay at Lilley's Landing. This is the best. The rooms are clean, located near the water, and very quiet in the evening. The staff is very knowledgeable and the marina and tackle shop is the best. I plan to stay again very soon.

Reviews.Title: “Going back soon”
Reviews.Author: FishRman_39
Reviews.Content: This was our first trip to Lilley’s but we are now making it a twice yearly trip. Lilley's has everything you need. It is in an excellent location, has friendly, helpful, and knowledgably staff, it’s clean, lots of amenities, and it’s very affordable. I stayed and fished with a group of friends but it would be an excellent place to stay as a family. I would highly recommend this resort.

Reviews.Title: “Simply Awesome”
Reviews.Author: loperjim
Reviews.Content: You cannot beat this on the water experience. The staff was friendly and prompt. The fishing is great, and the kitchens are wonderful. Such a great value. There is no doubt we will stay here again for our next fishing trip.

Reviews.Title: “What a great time at Lilleys Landing!”
Reviews.Author: Zeroondirt
Reviews.Content: We spent 3 days at Lilleys for some relaxation and of course the great trout fishing. Lilleys sets on the upper end of Lake Taneycomo which is one of the premiere trout fishing resources in the USA. This is a family owned and operated business so you get 'family' comfort with your stay. Just a great place to relax, fish, and of course being just minutes from Branson Missouri, great food, shopping, and entertainment. Lilleys has everything a fisherman would ever need and the service is simply great. If you need time away to relax and do some fishing, Lilleys is the place to stay. Even if you don't fish, Branson has so much to offer as well. Don't expect the Ritz Carlton but you can expect a clean, warm and very conformable family atmosphere!

Reviews.Title: “Best in the Area”
Reviews.Author: Tipsword3
Reviews.Content: My family has stayed at Lilley's several times over the last 20 years and love it. It's the place we go whether our stay in Branson is a couple days or a couple weeks. We love the fact that it is just outside the strip, doest take long to get to the heart of Branson, yet its so quiet and peaceful. We have told so many friends and family and they have also made it their place to stay while in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Lilley's Landing is a bright spot in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: OklahomaPopup
Reviews.Content: We recently met up with our extended family to vacation at Lilley's Landing on Lake Taneycomo in Branson, Missouri. Lilley's Landing is a resort that offers boat rentals too. We stayed in the 3 bedroom condo and found it to be very clean and well maintained. The swimming pool was nice as was the deck around the pool. We rented a pontoon boat for a number of days and found the guys working on the dock to be very helpful. The boat was clean and the tank topped off each morning when we left for a day of fishing. The resort office is well stocked and not pricey. Office personnel was very helpful and friendly. No one was put out when we asked for extra towels. When we purchased 6 bags of ice, an employee volunteered to carry them to our condo. Talk about helpful. We were pulling our pop up because we had been camping before this destination and they helped us to find a spot to store it. They never acted put out by this and just made everyone in the family feel so welcome. We have all decided to meet once a year at this lovely, family owned resort. When polite, friendly people are working, it makes for a very relaxed and enjoyable trip. Lilley's Landing is a bright spot in Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty Good Stay”
Reviews.Author: Rocket51
Reviews.Content: Just back from short stay at Lilleys. Resort is very nice , especially when compared to other local trout resorts that are close by. The grounds are very nice and extremely well kept. Pool was very nice and the kids loved it. Parking at the resort is just a tad bit tight. Dock is huge and well kept , nice cleaning stations for your catch. Front office is nice and lots of choices. We stayed in room 12 and it was just "ok'. Very small ! The bathroom is very small and tight (every where). A/C was cold and worked fine / water in restroom ran continously but not a real big deal since we basically just slept in our rooms since we were on the go so much. The front deck attached to room # 12 is fabulous !! Spacious with a wonderful view of Taneycomo. Employees were pretty nice and friendly , with one exception. One of the gals up front (dark hair) has pretty drab personality. Kind of acts like every request and basically yourself are a bother to her. If you avoid her all the rest are pretty nice and friendly. All in all nice stay but definitely going try different resort next trip to Branson. Rocket & family.

Reviews.Title: “Good Place.... Owner's should hire someone to run it due to rudeness”
Reviews.Author: rv8erdonna
Reviews.Content: We had reservations and upon arrival we asked if they possibly had a two bath available. The nice gentleman at the desk checked and advised us that in fact, one had just became available but it would have to be cleaned. I said that would be GREAT and we would wait as long as necessary. As I was at the front desk an older lady who worked their(owner also) came in and the gentleman told her that he had changed our room to the two bed/two bath. This lady was not happy and made no attempts to hide it! She stated that she would"HAVE TO CLEAN THE ROOM AND CHANGE THE SHEETS AND IT WOULD BE A WHILE BEFORE WE COULD ENTER THE ROOM"!!!! Feeling very uncomfortable, I said it would be ok and I even offered to help, thinking that maybe her help had left for the day. She just walked out and headed to the room. The room was upstairs and had a deck, so I asked if I could unload some things and place on the deck because I had to pick up my husband at the airport in Joplin, I was told yes no problem... by the gentleman. As I was placing my fishing equipment on the deck, the same lady came out and told me quite frankly....YOU CANNOT PUT THINGS IN THE ROOM NOW... WE ARE CLEANING.. I told her I was just placing some things on the deck in order to get room in my vehicle to pick up my husband and his luggage. She just turned and walked away. This, along with other run ins with the same lady were very uncomfortable and at one point, had it not been for my husband and sister, I would have been all over her, letting her know how incredibly rude she was and we would NEVER, return, only because of her attitude to her customers. The Landing is a nice place if you want to be treated like crap. However, I cannot allow myself to be treated this way when their are other places just as beautiful in Branson to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Best Resort in Branson!!!”
Reviews.Author: towerbug
Reviews.Content: After reading the reviews on tripadvisor, I booked a week long vacation at Lilleys Landing. We just returned and were all so impressed, I couldn't wait to write this review! The resort is nicely situated on Taneycomo Lake and is a short 2 mile drive to the 76 strip. You would never, never know you were this close to the Branson excitement because it is so peaceful and relaxing at this resort. Now the details.... this is the CLEANEST resort you'll ever see and it is so beautifully landscaped. The week we stayed it was extremely hot (97+)... The air conditioning was very, very cold; the hot water was very hot; the beds were very comfortable and as mentioned before, the cabins are very, very clean. We asked other visitors to see if they had as good of an experience as we did and they all agreed. The cabins all had the same degree of cleaniness and amenities. The cabins have a supply towels, equiped kitchen, etc. The resort is family friendly and provide a bevy of activities for children such as the swimming pool, a large playground and daycamp during the summer months. The proprietors are some of the nicest we've met traveling and are very good genuine people, accommodating all of your needs. They cleaned the pool every single morning and did a super job of cleaning the cabins and rooms. Many of the visitors we spoke to have been coming here for many years. There was not one single negative comment from anyone. That has got to say something. Those long time visitors probably won't like my review---They like the fact that this place is such a well kept secret. It's hard enough to get into this place but I feel like I owe it to others to experience this place. I may regret posting this review too..... I made reservations six months ahead of time. We will most certainly be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “BEST RESORT IN BRANSON AREA”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: The most relaxing and convenient place in Branson. It is great for a family. My husband loves to fish, my mother can sit on the porch and I feel very safe letting the kids play and run around. It is very clean and the staff is very accomodating. We have made this a three year tradition now to stay at Lilley's Landing. The grocery stores, shopping, shows and entertainment are just minutes away.

Reviews.Title: “Great for family!”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: Our whole family spent 4 days at Lilley's Landing in November and had a wonderful time. It was very clean, comfortable and relaxing. My husband and I are looking forward to visiting again real soon!! Lady (Lilly's dog) was a nice addition in the cabin..she loves to visit w/ the guests!! I was very surprised to see guests bring their own pets too! Considering that, the grounds were very well kept :) Oh and one other thing...that was the best sleep I had gotten in a long time..those mattresses are the BEST!

Reviews.Title: “Peaceful and relaxing”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We just returned from Lilley's for the weekend. We would highly recommend this place. Your accomodations and your surroundings are wonderful. The view from your deck is so peaceful. I wish I could live there. We will be returning in August for a longer stay. Can't wait to go back.

Reviews.Title: “Loved Lilley's Landing”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This is absolutely the most fabulous, serene, nostalgic place I've ever stayed. It's such a relief after a hectic day of shopping or theatre going to come home to peace, quiet, and a beautiful scenic place. The accommodations are the best. The owners are very hospitable and good Christian people. The help is great and the cleanliness of the facility is fantastic. I especially love the spring flowers. I also love the rustic hominess. I'll keep on coming back for years to come and highly recommend to anyone for a great family vacation their grandchildren will come back to.

HotelInfo.Name: Lilleys' Landing Resort & Marina
HotelInfo.Address: 367 River Lane, Branson, MO 65616
